germanParties.name: Christlich Demokratische Union Deutschlands
germanParties.summary: The CDU is a center-right political party in Germany and the largest party in the EPP group. It advocates for Christian democratic and liberal-conservative policies.

germanParties.name: Christlich-Soziale Union in Bayern
germanParties.summary: The CSU is a Christian-democratic and conservative political party in Bavaria, Germany. It works closely with the CDU on the national level and is part of the EPP group.

germanParties.name: Sozialdemokratische Partei Deutschlands
germanParties.fraction: Progressive Alliance of Socialists and Democrats (S&D)
germanParties.summary: The SPD is a social-democratic political party in Germany. It is one of the two major contemporary political parties in Germany and is part of the S&D group in the European Parliament.

germanParties.name: Freie Demokratische Partei
germanParties.summary: The FDP is a liberal political party in Germany. It advocates for individual rights, economic liberalism, and is part of the Renew Europe group in the European Parliament.

germanParties.name: Bündnis 90/Die Grünen
germanParties.summary: The Green Party is a political party in Germany that focuses on environmental issues, social justice, and sustainability. It is part of the Greens/EFA group in the European Parliament.

germanParties.name: Die Linke
germanParties.summary: Die Linke is a democratic socialist and left-wing political party in Germany. It aims to promote social justice, anti-capitalism, and is part of the GUE/NGL group in the European Parliament.

germanParties.name: Alternative für Deutschland
germanParties.summary: The AfD is a right-wing to far-right political party in Germany. It focuses on nationalism, immigration control, and is part of the ID group in the European Parliament.

germanParties.name: Freie Wähler
germanParties.summary: Freie Wähler is a political party in Germany that emphasizes local issues, direct democracy, and is part of the Renew Europe group in the European Parliament.

germanParties.name: Piratenpartei Deutschland
germanParties.summary: The Pirate Party Germany advocates for transparency, privacy rights, and internet freedom. It is part of the Greens/EFA group in the European Parliament.

germanParties.name: Ökologisch-Demokratische Partei
germanParties.summary: The ÖDP is a conservative and ecological political party in Germany. It focuses on environmental protection, sustainable development, and is part of the ECR group in the European Parliament.
